name: TheInfiniteEscape
description:
====================Live.Overpower.Operation.Potion==========================================L .O.O.P=======================

Dr. Xavier has been running an animal experiment, invlolving the L.O.O.P.

222 turles, mice and other animals were tested and all died. You are a hamster, which would have been the 223th.

Escape through Dr, X's lab into the vents, getting out of the back of the building and into the sewage system!
